content: adorable cat sweater will keep your small feline friend warm and cozy this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product size approximately 13 long x 13 around at widest point important note this cat sweater fits a small 7 lb sphynx cat other sizes are not provided however adventurous crocheters can follow the tips and tricks for help designing a sweater custom made to your cat s size > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 the > benefit of purchasing this pdf is an > easy to read printable and ad-free > version of the pattern materials needed * worsted weight yarn * crochet hook size g 6/4 0 mm * tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment pattern is written in english using standard american terms the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-cat-sweater/
